changeSet.author: fshaikh
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] ADD [DataScenarioTypeIDItemTypeID] [int] NULL
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_ItemTypes_DataScenarioTypeIDItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY ([DataScenarioTypeIDItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_StatisticalData_DataScenarioTypeIDItemTypeID] ON [dbo].[StatisticalData] ([DataScenarioTypeIDItemTypeID] ASC)
